dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, they're... they're missing out on 400 billion tenge? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, they're... they're missing out on four hundred billion tenge? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Но я хочу подчеркнуть, что на этом фоне мы теряем 160 тысяч новых налогоплательщиков и недополучаем порядка 400 млрд тенге дополнительных доходов.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, uh, that's what the Deputy Prime Minister said. It's a compromise, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, uh, that's what the Deputy Prime Minister said. It's a compromise, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Правительство и депутаты пришли к компромиссу в этом вопросе, сообщил заместитель премьер-министра – министр национальной экономики Серик Жумангарин.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A 'compromise' where you just, like, lose a ton of money? That sounds less like a compromise and more like... giving up, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A 'compromise' where you just, like, lose a ton of money? That sounds less like a compromise and more like... giving up, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, but there's important context! They did increase VAT, uh, to 16 percent, from 12.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, but there's important context! They did increase V A T, uh, to sixteen percent, from twelve.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, goodie. Four percent. That'll just, you know, fix everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, goodie. Four percent. That'll just, you know, fix everything.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the threshold! The VAT threshold will be 40 million tenge now. That was a big debate, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the threshold! The V A T threshold will be forty million tenge now. That was a big debate, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Порог по НДС будет установлен в размере 40 миллионов тенге.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, because debating millions of tenge is, um, incredibly thrilling stuff for everyone listening at home.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, because debating millions of tenge is, um, incredibly thrilling stuff for everyone listening at home.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it means they're not going to tax, like, all the small businesses right away! It actually, um, helps them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it means they're not going to tax, like, all the small businesses right away! It actually, um, helps them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Or it means fewer people in the tax net, which is why they're losing 160,000 potential new taxpayers. It's literally right there, in the article.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or it means fewer people in the tax net, which is why they're losing one hundred sixty thousand potential new taxpayers. It's literally right there, in the article.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Но я хочу подчеркнуть, что на этом фоне мы теряем 160 тысяч новых налогоплательщиков...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but look, they also prepared regulations to tighten opening individual entrepreneurships. For, like, people with violations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but look, they also prepared regulations to tighten opening individual entrepreneurships. For, like, people with violations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Кроме того, по его словам, в Казахстане ужесточат процесс открытия новых ИП. Соответствующие нормы уже подготовлены. 'Для тех, кто ранее допускал нарушения...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So they're making it harder for people to, um, just start businesses? Brilliant. Real genius strategy there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So they're making it harder for people to, um, just start businesses? Brilliant. Real genius strategy there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's for those with inactive IEs, or who previously, uh, committed violations. It's about, like, cleaning things up, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's for those with inactive IEs, or who previously, uh, committed violations. It's about, like, cleaning things up, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 'Для тех, кто ранее допускал нарушения, для тех, у кого есть дополнительно бездействующие ИП, открытие новых ИП будет более сложным процессом', - добавил вице-премьер.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Cleaning things up by making it, um, more complicated for everyone. Sounds about right.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Cleaning things up by making it, um, more complicated for everyone. Sounds about right.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the government and the deputies reached common approaches. It's a pretty big deal for, uh, policy making, frankly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the government and the deputies reached common approaches. It's a pretty big deal for, uh, policy making, frankly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Серик Жумангарин, представлявший доклад, заявил, что правительству и депутатам удалось выработать общие подходы.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Common approaches to losing billions and making things harder. Got it. Riveting content.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Common approaches to losing billions and making things harder. Got it. Riveting content.
